rows.label: tlk001101_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Rex-sama.
There is still quite some time left
before we reach Acedia.

rows.label: tlk001101_04_msg0002
rows.name:
And I am sure you must be tired after
all you went through in Superbia.

rows.label: tlk001101_04_msg0003
rows.name: Perhaps you would like to rest awhile?

rows.label: tlk001101_04_msg0008
rows.name:
Very well. Feel free to come back
whenever you are ready to retire.
